title: default value
extract: Default Values. A column can be assigned a default value. ... If no default value is declared explicitly, the default value is the null value. This usually makes sense because a null value can be considered to represent unknown data. In a table definition, default values are listed after the column data type.
extract_html: Default Values. A column can be assigned a default value. ... If no default value is declared explicitly, the default value is the null value.
